Key Match Events: Yashasvi Jaiswal (84 not out) and Shubman Gill (77) shared a 165-run opening partnership
India overhauled the target in 17 overs
Pre-Game Insights: West Indies won the toss and opted to bat first
India's Yashasvi Jaiswal and Shubman Gill are expected to retain their spots
Umran Malik might get a look in as an extra pacer
West Indies might bring in Shai Hope after their top order fizzled out in the last couple of matches
India needs a win to level the series and secure a deciding game tomorrow
Post-Match Reflections: India's bowlers performed well with Arshdeep Singh taking 3 wickets and Kuldeep Yadav taking 2 wickets
Shubman Gill and Yashasvi Jaiswal played outstanding innings for India
India's victory was crucial to keep the series alive
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch looked like an absolute beauty with no grass on the surface but a nice sheen
The average score on this ground is 165, indicating a high-scoring game
Others: The series is on the line with West Indies leading 2-1
This was the fourth T20I of the series
